Funakoshi died on 26 April 1957 in Tokyo of colon cancer, aged 88.
Selected works.
In an overview of writings by and about Funakoshi, OCLC/WorldCat lists roughly 30+ works in 60+ publications in 8 languages and 1,800+ library holdings.
